description: This Python script uploads a PDF file to Google GenAI, retrieves it, and uses an agent to generate summaries and recipe suggestions based on the file content.

classes.name: Agent
classes.description: An agent that interacts with the user and processes files for AI tasks.

classes.name: File
classes.description: Represents a media file to be processed or uploaded.

classes.name: Gemini
classes.description: A model class for Google Gemini AI models.

methods.name: client.files.upload
methods.description: Uploads a file to Google GenAI.

methods.name: client.files.get
methods.description: Retrieves a file from Google GenAI by name.

methods.name: agent.print_response
methods.description: Outputs a response generated by the agent, possibly including file content.
